attributes.action: introduce minimum sentancing and sentancing for every crime committed in a criminal act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On yesterdays BBC One news ( 20/02/2007 ) a young man was sentanced to 7 years for causing three counts of Death by Dangerous Driving, for this act, it is my opinion that he should have been sentanced as follows;
10 Years for each life taken, this would have been 30 years in prison, then calculating the additional criminal acts of speeding, leaving the scene of an accident and failing to report an accident and by not reporting the accident, a subsequent charge of attempting to pervert the course of justice and resisting arrest, he would have had at least anothter 10 years on top.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
